page.title: 04Compton Dundon_Community.
page.content: The village of Compton Dundon is split up into two main sections: that of Compton, and that of Dundon. The village hall and the public house are situated in Compton,and the school and church are in Dundon. In the{village {hall}many activities take place: for example, during the day there are upholstery classes and at night it is occasionally used as a discotheque.The hall is run by a committee of which the chairman, Major Strange, also owns the{shop/Post Office.}The shop is like any other village store and is the centre of the community. Next door there is a{filling station}and a repair shop which is owned by a young couple who employ at least one pump attendant and a mechanic. Near by there is a heavy goods vehicle garage. Castlebrook, the{public house}belongs to Courage Brewery.
